name: Hide and Seek or Else
description:
My first game! I hope you enjoy playing with my dog, Bruce, in a familiar setting. 

Made for the H Q Residential House Game Jam.

(I recommend using headphones, as the sound has been mixed for them, and hitting the full screen button)

Sources:

Background Song- SteviaSphere, Mallsoft is Alive

SFX- ZapSplat

And a few tunes I noodled in Garageband.
Drawn and animated in Procreate

A Game by Pickledinink
